title: #245: How To Fix A Drug Scandal, Part 1
description:
Laura Richards, Jim Clemente and Lisa Zambetti are joined by director, producer and writer Erin Lee Carr and criminal defence attorney Luke Ryan as we deep dive the Netflix show How to Fix a Drug Scandal.


Erin's four-part docuseries How to Fix a Drug Scandal was released on Netflix on April 1st. The series was among the top ten most watched shows on the platform during the first week of air. 

You won't want to miss it.
